description.title: What is Image Blur?
description.text: Image Blur is a free online tool that allows you to apply a blur effect to your images directly in your browser. Whether you need to obscure sensitive information like faces or license plates, or you want to create a soft, artistic background, this tool makes it easy. With adjustable intensity controls, you can get the exact look you want.

howTo.title: How to Use Image Blur
steps: Upload your image by dragging and dropping it into the box or clicking to select.
Adjust the 'Blur Intensity' slider to control the amount of blur.
The preview updates instantly as you adjust the slider.
Click 'Download' to save your blurred image.

questions.q: Is my image uploaded to a server?
questions.a: No. This tool runs entirely in your web browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.

questions.q: Can I blur only a specific part of the image?
questions.a: Currently, this tool applies a uniform blur to the entire image. We are working on adding selective blur features in future updates.

questions.q: Does this reduce the image quality?
questions.a: The tool maintains the original resolution of your image while applying the blur effect. The file size might change slightly depending on the format and blur level.
